mapper.select:
SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , A.ACT_ID , A.ISSUE_ID , A.ACT_DESC , A.ACT_STATUS_CD , A.ACT_TIME , A.ACT_USER_ID , A.ACT_USER_NM , A.ACT_USER_DEPT , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.SYSMODTIME , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT , MAX(B.FILE_SAVE_NM) AS ORG_FILE_NM , COUNT(B.FILE_SAVE_NM) AS FILE_CNT
FROM PJ_ISSUE_ACTION A , FOMM_ATCHFILE_MT B
WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.ISSUE_ID = B.PK1(+) AND A.ACT_ID = B.PK2(+) AND B.DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND B.TEMP_YN(+) = 'N'
AND B.KEY_TBL(+) = 'PJ_ISSUE_ACTION' AND A.ISSUE_ID = #{ISSUE_ID}
GROUP BY A.ACT_ID , A.ISSUE_ID , A.ACT_DESC , A.ACT_STATUS_CD , A.ACT_TIME , A.ACT_USER_ID , A.ACT_USER_NM , A.ACT_USER_DEPT , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.SYSMODTIME , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT
ORDER BY A.ACT_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'PJIS' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(NVL(SUBSTR(ISSUE_ID, -6), 0) )), 0) + 1, 6, 0) FROM PJ_ISSUE WHERE 1 = 1 AND ISSUE_ID LIKE 'PJIS%' AND LENGTH(ISSUE_ID) = 16
INSERT INTO PJ_ISSUE ( ISSUE_ID , ISSUE_NO , ISSUE_NAME , PJT_ID , RISK_ID , ISSUE_STATUS_CD , ISSUE_TYPE_CD , ISSUE_DESC , ISSUE_STIME , ISSUE_IMPACT_CD , ISSUE_PLAN , CPL_PLAN_TIME , CPL_ACT_TIME , CHG_USER_ID , CHG_USER_NM , CHG_USER_DEPT
, REG_STIME , REG_USER_ID , REG_USER_NM , REG_USER_DEPT
, SYSMODTIME , LMOD_USER_ID , LMOD_USER_NM , LMOD_USER_DEPT ) VALUES ( #{ISSUE_ID} , #{ISSUE_NO} , #{ISSUE_NAME} , #{PJT_ID} , #{RISK_ID} , #{ISSUE_STATUS_CD} , #{ISSUE_TYPE_CD} , #{ISSUE_DESC} , #{ISSUE_STIME} , #{ISSUE_IMPACT_CD} , #{ISSUE_PLAN} , #{CPL_PLAN_TIME} , #{CPL_ACT_TIME} , #{CHG_USER_ID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{CHG_USER_ID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{CHG_USER_ID})
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{LMID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID})
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{LMID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) )
